import React from 'react'; import { Form, Button, FloatingLabel, InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Eye, EyeSlash, XCircleFill, CheckCircleFill } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; import '../style/register.css' const RegisterForm = (props) => { const checkUsernameLength = () => { return props.inputs.username.length >= 6 && props.inputs.username.length <= 20; } const checkUsernameFormat = () => { const usernameFormat = /^[\w-]+$/; return usernameFormat.test(props.inputs.username); } const checkEmailMatch = () => { } return (

) }; export default RegisterForm;
